message.raw:
Changed: Convex-Trimesh collider added (libccd+GIMPACT only)(by Piotr Piastucki)
Changed: dCreateConvex() and dGeomSetConvex() public APIs changed to expect their parameter arrays as const pointers
Fixed: LibCCD colliders enabled with --with-libccd in premake
Fixed: LibCCD presence preprocessor symbol fixed to be dLIBCCD_ENABLED with both automake and premake
Fixed: Compilation errors fixed with some configurations in MSVC

Fixed: LibCCD colliders enabled with --with-libccd in premake
Fixed: LibCCD presence preprocessor symbol fixed to be dLIBCCD_ENABLED with both automake and premake
Fixed: Compilation errors fixed with some configurations in MSVC
